lines.text: Somebody has to run things. Sergeant Trainor has experience in this country. I'm a civilian, and I'll follow his orders.
I'll tell you when to drink, when to eat, when to sleep, and when to breathe!

[Referring to her brother at the fort]
I'm visiting, and I'd like to get there as soon as possible.
Black Cloud come to make peace talk.

[Sarcastically]
I didn't think you came here to make jokes. What's on your mind?
Black Cloud mighty chief... greatest of all! His warriors are many...

[Interrupting]
Soon as you're finished patting yourself on the back, let's get down to cases. What's the deal?
